content: just mince pie christmas decoration by linda fownes this isn t just a mince pie this is an everlasting best ever mince pie add thread to hang from your tree for a unique decoration or make a plate full for a diet friendly festive treat materials light and dark brown dk wool 3 5mm crochet hook small amount of stuffing tapestry needle for sewing for the pie do not join rounds 1 using light brown 6sc in a magic_ring 6 sts 2 2sc in each st around 12 sts 3 2sc single_crochet around 18 sts 4 2sc single_crochet in next 2 sts around 24 sts 5 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 sts around 30 sts 6 in blo 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 9 sts around 33 sts 7 single_crochet around 33 sts 8 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 10 sts around 36 sts 9 in flo single_crochet around 36 sts 10 single_crochet slip_stitch around 36 sts fasten_off light brown 11 attach dark brown to any back loop stitch from round 9 single_crochet decrease in next two sts single_crochet in next 4 sts around 30 sts 12 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 3 sts around 24 sts 13 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 2 sts around 18 sts 14 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next st around 12 sts stuff pie gently now 15 single_crochet decrease around 6 sts fasten_off dark brown for the star topper 1 with light brown 15 double_crochet in a magic_ring join to first double_crochet with a slip_stitch 2 chain 5 slip_stitch in second chain from hook single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet skip next 2 sts and join with a slip_stitch repeat 4 more times join with a slip_stitch fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing sew the star to the top of the mince pie and weave in any ends optional sew some thread to the side of the mince pie for a hanging tree decoration
